About Me

Hello there! I'm thrilled to welcome you to my portfolio. I am a passionate and versatile full-stack developer with a keen interest in exploring the latest cutting-edge technologies. My journey in the world of web development has been nothing short of exhilarating, and I constantly strive to enhance my skills and embrace emerging trends in the industry. I have a high passion in Mobile Development beside my journey to become a well known developer I do like to help people build their innovation to change the way we process things more effectively in real life with the technology of apps and website.

What I do!

Web development

As a developer, I find myself in a phase of learning a new technology such as Web Development with the basics knowledge of HTML, CSS and Javascript. I tried a few Frameworks such as Laravel and CI.

Mobile App Development

As a developer, I find myself most captivated by the power and flexibility of Flutter and Native Android. I'm passionate about building apps to help people and companies reach their goals.

ERP

I started my first-ever career in IT as an Epicor Developer in a small company that was responsible for reporting daily transactions and fulfilling requests from the Finance department to create sets of data or dashboards to effectively evaluate the business process.

Virtual Reality Development

I have experience creating a simulation game for my final project in University as a requirement to complete my degree. I developed a Public Speaking simulation using an innovative technology—Virtual Reality.
